class.name: EPASController
class.brief_description: Node that controls the EPAS animation system on a given skeleton.

method.name: advance
method.description: Advances the time of the controller, called automatically unless [member playback_process_mode] is set to [constant MANUAL]

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Connects the [EPASNode] [param from] to one of [param to]'s [param input]s. Additionally, a [param unique_name] must be given, one that doesn't exist in this controller.

method.name: connect_node_to_root
method.description: Connects the [EPASNode] [param from] to the output node of this controller. Additionally, a [param unique_name] must be given, one that doesn't exist in this controller.

method.name: get_epas_node
method.description: Returns the node with the given [StringName].

members.member: What callback thiis controller should use to process the animation tree.
Path to the [Skeleton3D] on which to apply this controller.
